踓踓踓
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

踓字的基本解释

踓
wěi
蹴。
跑的样子。
狂跑。

踓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》以水切，上旨，以。］
(1)蹵。
(2)走貌。
(3)狂走。
[②]［cù］
［《集韻》七六切，入屋，清。］
同“蹴1”。
践踏，踩。

踓字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1227第25
【廣韻】以水切【集韻】【韻會】愈水切，?音唯。走也。【類篇】狂走。【玉篇】同趡。　又【集韻】七六切，音蹴。躡也。

踓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
踓字的起名意思

暂无。

Stumble
Basic explanation of words
Stumble
wěi
kick.
The appearance of running.
Run wild.
Stumble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" cuts with water, puts on the purpose, with. ]
(1) Go.
(2) Appearance.
(3) Go wild.
[②]［cù］
["Jiyun" seven or six cuts, enter the house, clear. ]
Same as "Ke 1".
Trample, step on.
Stumble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　踓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1227-25
[Guangyun] Cut with water [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Cut with more water, sound only. Go also. 【Classes】Go wild. 【Jade articles】The same.　[Jiyun] Seven or six cuts, sound sneak. Qie also.
